Welcome to shinkei's documentation
==================================

``shinkei`` is a modern and simple to use asynchronous client for `singyeong <https://github.com/queer/singyeong>`_,
a fully-dynamic, metadata-oriented service mesh.

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents

   quickstart
   api
